attributes.action: act NOW to deter juvenile crimes by introducing appropriate deterrents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have just watched tonights news - an 11 year old boy MURDERED in cold blood - in addition shootings in Hertfordshire, biker shot on the motorway - when will this government respond with appropriate punishments to fit the crime - no more excuses, parenting, upbringing etc - the law abiding public have the right to be protected and feel safe to walk their streets

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
